Description

10UP Energy Drink

Size: 250 ml / 500 ml Can

Serving size 1 can per person

Made in Turkey

Ingredients

  • Water, Sugar (Sucrose/Glucose syrup),

  • Acidity Regulators (Citric Acid, Trisodium Citrate),

  • Carbondioxide, Mixed Fruit Flavour, Preservative (Sodium Benzoate),

  • Colorant (Caramel), Taurine (Max 800mg/L), Caffeine (Max 150mg/L),

  • Inositol (Max 100mg/L), Vitamins (B3, B6, B5, B2),

  • Glucoronolactone (Max 20mg/L)
